channel.title: Variable GrandExchangeHandler [317]
channel.description:
I added a fairly primitive grand exchange to my server earlier and when I compile I get this error. can anyone tell me how to fix it. I have the GrandExchangeHandler.java in my source so it's not that it's not loading it.
[code]Compiling..... client.java:490: cannot find symbol symbol : variable GrandExchangeHandler location: class server server.GrandExchangeHandler.LoadGrandExchange(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

I’ve actually learned a lot and after this I’m helping my friend with his hyperion source so there you go

item.title: Variable GrandExchangeHandler [317]
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Yeah but how much about programming have you learned, once you finish with that project, I would really recommend switching bases to something like Runesource or Hyperion, something a little more respectable and will teach you a fuckton more.

Read full topic

item.title: Variable GrandExchangeHandler [317]
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Well most people wish delta had never been released because it taught people nothing but how to leach but we wouldn’t be where we are today if it wasn’t for delta or pi believe it or not.

I refuse to believe that because having all of these delta and PI sources means people already have everything in the source and I see it as lazyness and lack of creativity.I started my server from a near blank base, a 10 year old could have made it but now it has chaotics, spirit shields, all the dungeoneering items and I’m trying to perfect all the emotes now. That’s why I have so many topics on this, because I’m making a server, client, and website on my own.

Read full topic

item.title: Variable GrandExchangeHandler [317]
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:6, topic:399520”]Depending on where your grand exchange classes and methods are, add something like this to the top of the class.

import server.util.Misc;

Thats saying it’s importing from server\util\misc folders.[/quote]
I tried that . just gives me another error :D, its not PI so almost everything is in the main folder . I hate PI

Read full topic

item.title: Variable GrandExchangeHandler [317]
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Depending on where your grand exchange classes and methods are, add something like this to the top of the class.

import server.util.Misc;

Thats saying it’s importing from server\util\misc folders.

Read full topic
